description: Variation of Conditions 2 (Approved Plans), 3 (Construction Management Plan), 5 (SUDs), 8 (Tree Protection), 10 (Step Free Access), 14 (PD rights) and 15 (Obscure Glazing) of planning permission ref. 76195/APP/2024/112, dated 15-04-2024 (Variation of Condition 2 (approved plans) and Variation of Condition 5 (Sustainable water management and water efficiency) of planning permission ref. 76195/APP/2023/2332, dated 13-11-2023 (Erection of a two storey, 6-bed, detached dwelling house with habitable roof space and additional vehicular crossover, involving demolition of existing dwelling house.) to raise the roof height and finished floor level. Installation of 2no. bay windows and enlarging approved two storey rear extension.) to widen crossover, amend fenestration, provide details regarding access and tree protection and amend PD rights (revised 29.05.25).
